characteristics.vegetation: Sparse, with hardy shrubs and permafrost
elements: Ice Frozen essence of winter, wielder of chilling touch and frostbite.
Time Unstoppable flow, the weaver of destiny and the shaper of reality.
Patience Master of time, the quiet endurance waiting for the right moment.
Resilience The phoenix rising, the ability to recover from adversity.
Wood Silent witness of time, carrier of life's cycle of growth and decay.
